location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Jonathan Duncan, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Bombay Government that the Benaresand Prince of Waleshave returned from a cruise to Muscat. It reports that the two vessels did not encounter a single pirate boat during the course of their voyage and that the current quiet state of the Gulf is due to the military efforts of Said bin Sultan Al-Said, the Sultan of Muscat.
